pros: Exceptional stability for overpronators; Ultra-durable outsole; Max-stack cushioning; Roomy toebox; Rubber Wall tech enhances medial support; Reflective heel details; Versatile for daily wear; Secure lacing system
cons: H-E-A-V-Y; Ride lacks excitement; Heel padding durability concerns; Could use better breathability
RR_verdict: In our view, the Mizuno Wave Horizon 7 is a tank of a shoe—built for battle with exceptional stability and world-class outsole durability. We found that its ultra-wide base delivers a steady, reliable ride that effortlessly supports overpronators. While its hefty weight and massive build can feel clunky, the spacious toebox and plush fit deliver impressive comfort for easy miles.
